fields.title: Bayesian information criterion
fields.pointers:
*  [Akaike Information Criterion (AIC)](akaike_information_criterion)  is a different model selection criterion with different theoretical underpinnings, and practically, AIC does not penalize the number of parameters as severely as BIC
*  [Mathematical justification](justifying_aic_and_bic)  of the BIC.
fields.summary: The Bayesian information criterion (BIC) is a rough approximation to the marginal likelihood, based on the asymptotic behavior of the Laplace approximation as more data is observed.
